name: Revolution Semiconductor
overview:
Revolution Semiconductor (or Revsemi(TM)) is a growing semiconductor intellectual property and design services provider. We specialise in ultra low-power short-range wireless communications such as passive RFID and transceiver chips for wireless sensor networks.

Semiconductor Intellectual Property Development: We are about to offer an EPC Gen-2 compliant UHF RFID tag chip intellectual property including RF/analogue front-end and digital baseband in TSMC 180nm CMOS technology. We will announce the details shortly.

Analogue/Mixed-Signal/RF Integrated Circuit Design: Our team and affiliates have more than forty five years experience in analog/mixed-signal and radio frequency integrated circuit and layout design and have taped chips with production numbers exceeding millions. We can also handle your digital design needs, ASIC or FPGA, from the concept to GDSII.

Marketing of Semiconductor IP and EDA Software: With our extensive contacts in the Near East and beyond, we can help you in targeting the right customers for your intellectual property or the Electronic Design Automation (EDA) Software. We have so far worked with Magma Design Automation, Silanna, Arteris and OneSpin.
